Yunseon

Introduction

LIMETREE (라임트리) was a five-member girl group managed by A+ Entertainment. The group lineup included members Yunseon, Myeonggyeong, Dahyeon, Jieun, and Kokona.

Unfortunately, LIMETREE appears to have quietly disbanded, as their Instagram account now reflects the name A-Girls, suggesting a possible re-branding. Since 2019, their account has remained inactive.
